ALWAYS ACTIVE: Valkyrie gains +1 Combo Meter when striking into an Opponent’s Block, as well as 1.10% of her Max Power.

When striking into her Opponent’s Block with 3 or more active Pierce effects, her mythical sword Dragonfang cuts through their defenses to inflict an instant Bleed dealing them 66.5 Direct Damage, scaling with her Block Penetration.
When afflicted by a Non-Damaging Debuff, Valkyrie’s conviction gives her up to a 90% chance to Purify it, scaling with her Block Proficiency.

Valkyrie starts the fight with an indefinite passive Combo Shield that, when struck, prevents her from losing Combo for 3 seconds before falling off. As a Defender, this Shield does not fall off when struck while below 11 Combo.
COMBO METER: Performing Valkyrie's Light Combo Ender inverts her Combo Gain. While inverted, any time the Combo Meter would increase or decrease by any amount, it changes by the opposite amount instead, excluding Combo lost when struck. This ability is unaffected by Ability Accuracy.
Performing her Medium Combo Ender reverts her Combo Gain back to normal. It is also reverted at any time her Combo is less than 3
Whenever Valkyrie's Combo Meter rises past a multiple of 10, she gains an indefinite Pierce Buff of 939.68 potency. Maximum of {3}.
Whenever Valkyrie's Combo Meter drops past a multiple of 10, she gains an indefinite Bulwark Buff, granting 533.33 Block Proficiency. Maximum of {3}.
When a Pierce or Bulwark Buff is replaced, consumed, or expires off of Valkyrie for any reason, she gains a Passive version of that Buff with double the original potency for 5 second(s).
HEAVY ATTACKS: The final hit of this attack consumes all of Valkyrie’s Pierce and Bulwark Buffs, and inflicts an Intimidate Debuff on the Opponent, making them more defensive and reducing their Block Proficiency by 400, and lasting 1.20 second(s) for each Buff consumed this way.
This attack grants Valkyrie no Power.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Combo Gained during this attack is doubled.

On activation, grants 3 dormant Evade charges. Max. {3}. Hitting the Opponent’s Block with a Combo Ender or the final hit of a Special Attack activates one of the charges, allowing Valkyrie to passively Evade one attack within the next 1 second(s), after which the charge expires.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: On Activation, gain a Fury Passive lasting 13 seconds and granting 23.75 Attack Rating for each active Pierce and Bulwark effect. Hits into the Opponent’s Block gain double this Attack Rating increase.
While this Fury is active, Valkyrie’s Pierce and Bulwark effects are paused.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Inflicts an Intimidate Debuff, making the Opponent more defensive and reducing their Block Proficiency by 1066.67 for 10 second(s).
Valkyrie gains another of her personal Combo Shields and 3 dormant Evade charges.

sig_info: While Valkyrie has at least 3.95 to 1 Pierce effect(s) active (rounded up), Unstoppable Opponents react to hits as though they weren’t.
While Valkyrie has at least 3.95 to 1 Bulwark effect(s) active (rounded up), she is immune to Stun Debuffs.

When striking into her Opponent’s Block with 3 or more active Pierce effects, her mythical sword Dragonfang cuts through their defenses to inflict an instant Bleed dealing them 690.9 Direct Damage, scaling with her Block Penetration.
When afflicted by a Non-Damaging Debuff, Valkyrie’s conviction gives her up to a 90% chance to Purify it, scaling with her Block Proficiency.

Valkyrie starts the fight with an indefinite passive Combo Shield that, when struck, prevents her from losing Combo for 3 seconds before falling off. As a Defender, this Shield does not fall off when struck while below 11 Combo.
COMBO METER: Performing Valkyrie's Light Combo Ender inverts her Combo Gain. While inverted, any time the Combo Meter would increase or decrease by any amount, it changes by the opposite amount instead, excluding Combo lost when struck. This ability is unaffected by Ability Accuracy.
Performing her Medium Combo Ender reverts her Combo Gain back to normal. It is also reverted at any time her Combo is less than 3
Whenever Valkyrie's Combo Meter rises past a multiple of 10, she gains an indefinite Pierce Buff of 1145.24 potency. Maximum of {3}.
Whenever Valkyrie's Combo Meter drops past a multiple of 10, she gains an indefinite Bulwark Buff, granting 650 Block Proficiency. Maximum of {3}.
When a Pierce or Bulwark Buff is replaced, consumed, or expires off of Valkyrie for any reason, she gains a Passive version of that Buff with double the original potency for 5 second(s).
HEAVY ATTACKS: The final hit of this attack consumes all of Valkyrie’s Pierce and Bulwark Buffs, and inflicts an Intimidate Debuff on the Opponent, making them more defensive and reducing their Block Proficiency by 487.5, and lasting 1.20 second(s) for each Buff consumed this way.
This attack grants Valkyrie no Power.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Combo Gained during this attack is doubled.

On activation, grants 3 dormant Evade charges. Max. {3}. Hitting the Opponent’s Block with a Combo Ender or the final hit of a Special Attack activates one of the charges, allowing Valkyrie to passively Evade one attack within the next 1 second(s), after which the charge expires.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: On Activation, gain a Fury Passive lasting 13 seconds and granting 246.75 Attack Rating for each active Pierce and Bulwark effect. Hits into the Opponent’s Block gain double this Attack Rating increase.
While this Fury is active, Valkyrie’s Pierce and Bulwark effects are paused.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Inflicts an Intimidate Debuff, making the Opponent more defensive and reducing their Block Proficiency by 1300 for 10 second(s).
Valkyrie gains another of her personal Combo Shields and 3 dormant Evade charges.

sig_info: While Valkyrie has at least 3.95 to 1 Pierce effect(s) active (rounded up), Unstoppable Opponents react to hits as though they weren’t.

While Valkyrie has at least 3.98 to 1 Bulwark effect(s) active (rounded up), she is immune to Stun Debuffs.

ALWAYS ACTIVE: Valkyrie gains +1 Combo Meter when striking into an Opponent’s Block, as well as 1.10% of her Max Power.

When striking into her Opponent’s Block with 3 or more active Pierce effects, her mythical sword Dragonfang cuts through their defenses to inflict an instant Bleed dealing them 2724.4 Direct Damage, scaling with her Block Penetration.
When afflicted by a Non-Damaging Debuff, Valkyrie’s conviction gives her up to a 90% chance to Purify it, scaling with her Block Proficiency.

Valkyrie starts the fight with an indefinite passive Combo Shield that, when struck, prevents her from losing Combo for 3 seconds before falling off. As a Defender, this Shield does not fall off when struck while below 11 Combo.
COMBO METER: Performing Valkyrie's Light Combo Ender inverts her Combo Gain. While inverted, any time the Combo Meter would increase or decrease by any amount, it changes by the opposite amount instead, excluding Combo lost when struck. This ability is unaffected by Ability Accuracy.
Performing her Medium Combo Ender reverts her Combo Gain back to normal. It is also reverted at any time her Combo is less than 3
Whenever Valkyrie's Combo Meter rises past a multiple of 10, she gains an indefinite Pierce Buff of 1292.06 potency. Maximum of {3}.
Whenever Valkyrie's Combo Meter drops past a multiple of 10, she gains an indefinite Bulwark Buff, granting 733.33 Block Proficiency. Maximum of {3}.
When a Pierce or Bulwark Buff is replaced, consumed, or expires off of Valkyrie for any reason, she gains a Passive version of that Buff with double the original potency for 5 second(s).
HEAVY ATTACKS: The final hit of this attack consumes all of Valkyrie’s Pierce and Bulwark Buffs, and inflicts an Intimidate Debuff on the Opponent, making them more defensive and reducing their Block Proficiency by 550, and lasting 1.20 second(s) for each Buff consumed this way.
This attack grants Valkyrie no Power.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Combo Gained during this attack is doubled.

On activation, grants 3 dormant Evade charges. Max. {3}. Hitting the Opponent’s Block with a Combo Ender or the final hit of a Special Attack activates one of the charges, allowing Valkyrie to passively Evade one attack within the next 1 second(s), after which the charge expires.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: On Activation, gain a Fury Passive lasting 13 seconds and granting 973 Attack Rating for each active Pierce and Bulwark effect. Hits into the Opponent’s Block gain double this Attack Rating increase.
While this Fury is active, Valkyrie’s Pierce and Bulwark effects are paused.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Inflicts an Intimidate Debuff, making the Opponent more defensive and reducing their Block Proficiency by 1466.67 for 10 second(s).
Valkyrie gains another of her personal Combo Shields and 3 dormant Evade charges.

sig_info: While Valkyrie has at least 3.98 to 1 Pierce effect(s) active (rounded up), Unstoppable Opponents react to hits as though they weren’t.
While Valkyrie has at least 3.98 to 1 Bulwark effect(s) active (rounded up), she is immune to Stun Debuffs.
